name: dribbler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who moves a ball along the ground with repeated small kicks or hits, or (in basketball) who moves a ball by repeatedly hitting it so it bounces off the floor: She's a good dribbler. He's more of a dribbler and Cesc is more of a passer. See
dribble
More examplesFewer examplesBob was a fine dribbler and a neat header of the ball.Expert dribblers dexterously pounded basketballs and executed trick maneuvers. Messi is more of a dribbler in a very short space, but Ronaldo is good in the air, good on free-kicks, right foot, left foot.
